segments.text: Frank , I want your advice on something . Some scientists I met at the conference 6 this afternoon have invited me to a party . Actually , they called it an informal get-together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I asked how people were going to dress , Dr . Lite said it was casual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you want to know what to wear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , last night I went out with some journalists for a casual party , but I was overdressed . I wore what I consider casual - - an outfit of skirt , blouse , scarf , and medium heels ... you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds just right to me . What was wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everyone else there was wearing blue jeans . Several of the women had on running shoes . I felt out of place . So I have no idea what to wear tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My guess is you can safely wear last night ’ s outfit to tonight ’ s party .
segments.speaker: S2
